item.title: Return HTB Box
item.description: Name of box: - Return: Initial NMAP Scan & Start-Up Responder: I tend to run a very basic nmap scan initially so I can look for low hanging fruit that I can enumerate whilst my more in-depth scans are running: In this case it’s very useful as we can see that ldap is runing which means we can do a significant amount of enumeration if anonymous bind is enabled. kali in ~ 2GiB/7GiB | 0B/1GiB with /usr/bin/zsh üïô 11:12:51 zsh ‚ùØ nmap $box Starting Nmap 7.
